name: Die Hard Man
description:
Die Hard Man- Play as an android that can be infinity rebuilt. Self destruct and use your corpse as a stepping stone to get over obstacles.

(sorry it's short and sound is weird in the web build :/ )

===========================================================

A and D to move

W to jump

Hold S to Self Destruct

E to shoot (used to destroy corpses)

===========================================================

Special thanks to annoyedCactus and Pushbar for the music!

https://freesound.org/people/annoyedCactus/sounds/455017/

https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/330100
